description.value:
Heroic Membership: Your adventures have earned you a unique place in a powerful organization. Check the box next to one of the following options and cross the other off your Chronicle Sheet.

□ Lacunafex Membership You have been adopted into the Lacunafex spy network and have access to the following feats and spells:

  • Feats: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Different Worlds]{Different Worlds}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Reveal Machinations]{Reveal Machinations}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Silver's Refrain]{Silver's Refrain}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Tweak Appearances]{Tweak Appearances}.
  • Spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Exchange Image]{Exchange Image}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Join Pasts]{Join Pasts}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Silver's Refrain]{Silver's Refrain}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spiritual Anamnesis]{Spiritual Anamnesis}.

□ Bellflower Membership You are a member of the Bellflower Network and gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.cdnkS3A8OpOnRjKu]{Bellflower Tiller} archetype, its associated feats, and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Bellflower Toolbelt]{Bellflower Toolbelt}.
